title: "Ayanna Howard named ACM Athena Lecturer"
excerpt: "ACM, the Association for Computing Machinery, today named Ayanna Howard, dean of The Ohio State University College of Engineering, as the 2021-2022 ACM Athena Lecturer. Howard is recognized for fundamental contributions to the development of accessible human-robotic systems and artificial intelligence,"
